channel.title: Fragaria Vesca on funPlantGenes
channel.description: Recent content in Fragaria Vesca on funPlantGenes

item.title: FaGAMYB
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: FaGAMYB Gene Name: MYB transcription factor Genome: Species: Fragaria vesca Functional Descriptions: Central role of FaGAMYB in the transition of the strawberry receptacle from development to ripening.

item.title: FvebZIPs1.1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: FvebZIPs1.1 Gene Name: basic leucine zipper transcription factor s1.

item.title: FveFT2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: FvH4_4g30710 Gene Symbol: FveFT2 Gene Name: FLOWERING LOCUS T 2 Genome: Species: Fragaria vesca Functional Descriptions: The FveFT2 florigen/FveTFL1 antiflorigen balance is critical for the control of seasonal flowering in strawberry while FveFT3 modulates axillary meristem fate and yield.

item.title: FveFT3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: FvH4_3g09870 Gene Symbol: FveFT3 Gene Name: FLOWERING LOCUS T 3 Genome: Species: Fragaria vesca Functional Descriptions: The FveFT2 florigen/FveTFL1 antiflorigen balance is critical for the control of seasonal flowering in strawberry while FveFT3 modulates axillary meristem fate and yield.

item.title: FvePHP
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: FvH4_1g25470 Gene Symbol: FvePHP Gene Name: Genome: F.

item.title: FveTFL1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: FvH4_6g18480 Gene Symbol: FveTFL1 Gene Name: TERMINAL FLOWER 1 Genome: Species: Fragaria vesca Functional Descriptions: The FveFT2 florigen/FveTFL1 antiflorigen balance is critical for the control of seasonal flowering in strawberry while FveFT3 modulates axillary meristem fate and yield.

item.title: FveYUC4
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: FvH4_2g29930 Gene Symbol: FveYUC4 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Fragaria vesca Functional Descriptions: Auxin biosynthesis gene FveYUC4 is critical for leaf and flower morphogenesis in woodland strawberry.

item.title: FvJAZ12
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: FvH4_1g09690 Gene Symbol: FvJAZ12 Gene Name: jasmonate-ZIM domain 12 Genome: Fragaria_vesca.

item.title: FvLOX3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: FvH4_6g34960 Gene Symbol: FvLOX3 Gene Name: lipoxygenase 3 Genome: Species: Fragaria vesca Functional Descriptions: FvMPK6 phosphorylates FvJAZ12 at the amino acid residues S179 and T183 adjacent to the PY residues, thereby attenuating its nuclear accumulation and relieving its repression for FvMYC2, which acts to control the expression of lipoxygenase 3 (FvLOX3), an important gene involved in JA biosynthesis and a diverse array of cellular metabolisms.

item.title: FvYUC6
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: FvYUC6 Gene Name: YUCCA6 Genome: Species: Fragaria vesca Functional Descriptions: Functionality of the FvYUC6 gene was studied in transgenic strawberry overexpressing FvYUC6, which showed typical high-auxin phenotypes.

item.title: RAP

item.title: SL1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: FvH4_7g28640 Gene Symbol: SL1 Gene Name: SIMPLE LEAF1 Genome: Species: Fragaria vesca Functional Descriptions: A GT-1 and PKc domain-containing transcription regulator SIMPLE LEAF1 (SL1) controls compound leaf development in woodland strawberry.
